AMSIMP¶

Warning

Please note that versions of AMSIMP v0.3.x and below are no longer supported. Please instal the latest version of AMSIMP to get access to the latest features. Please note that it is strongly recommended that you install AMSIMP via Anaconda Cloud.

An open-source ensemble prediction scheme implementation to simulating atmospheric dynamics in the troposphere and the stratosphere, written in the programming language of Cython. Read the paper.
